name: PEND_PRED_LOC_GRP
description: This table contains predicted next destination level of care groupers for pend (PND) records based on predictive models.

columns.name: PEND_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the pended entry record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PRED_LOC_GRP_C_NAME
columns.description: The predicted next destination level of care groupers for pending event records based on predictive models.

columns.name: PRED_LOC_CONF_NUM
columns.description: The percent confidence from the predictive model for each of the predicted next destination level of care groupers.
